alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McNairy and southwestern Hardin Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shiloh, or 10 miles east of Selmer, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pickwick Dam, Shiloh, Michie, Stantonville, Counce, Pebble Hill, Southside, Hamburg, Tulu, Pittsburg Landing, Childers Hill, West Shihloh, Hurley, Walkertown, Chambers and Shiloh National Military Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
